content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a perfect place to live. So, what price were you thinking for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student, so I am looking for a good deal. I was thinking about 500 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 500 Euro per month is a very reasonable price for a student, considering the location and amenities. However, I must admit that I am looking to rent the apartment for a bit higher price, given its prime location and modern features. Would you be willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I am open to negotiations. However, I want to make sure that I am getting a good deal. How much were you thinking?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I was hoping to get closer to 700 Euro per month, considering the high demand for apartments in the city center and the quality of this particular unit. It's a brand new construction with all the modern conveniences. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 700 Euro per month seems a bit high for me. I am willing to pay 600 Euro per month. I am a dependable and responsible tenant, so I believe I deserve a good deal.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 600 Euro per month is a fair offer, considering your status as a student. However, I have to ensure that I am getting the best possible price for my property. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at 650 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise for both parties.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 650 Euro per month!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that! The price of 650 Euro per month is very fair, and I think it's a great deal for both of us. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
